threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

exiftool.ImageFileCharacteristics: Executable, No line numbers, No symbols, 32-bit

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects process creation events that use the Sysnative folder (common for CobaltStrike spawns)

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=90E053299C42B2DF079BBA9AA901F607DF5158B2,MD5=9B6EAD5E06F0C61F9E569A6FCCBDE684,SHA256=D61B30A1229479227788BA58EFC2648A5FAA02F522AE1D24CC9C9DC052A28945,IMPHASH=E8309E14FD0CD5D0959FCC7F5E47D546; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=Fondue.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows Features on Demand UX; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\fondue.exe" /enable-feature:NetFx3 /caller-name:mscoreei.dll; CommandLine="C:\Windows\sysnative\FonDUE.EXE" /enable-feature:NetFx3 /caller-name:mscoreei.dll; FileVersion=10.0.22621.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\Fondue.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\Fondue.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: ADS Zone.Identifier Deleted By Uncommon Application
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the deletion of the "Zone.Identifier" ADS by an uncommon process. Attackers can leverage this in order to bypass security restrictions that make use of the ADS such as Microsoft Office apps.
Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows

configs: @{extra_info=; files_dropped=System.Object[]; implant_info=; net_info=; txt_configs=System.Object[]; host_info=; tool=MANDIANT_BACKSCATTER_MEMDUMP_ZENBOX}
